entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending early this morning then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Clearing this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 5 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries this evening then 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023
